document.heading: Tregaron Conservancy Tax Exemption and Relief Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-119, the “Tregaron Conservancy Tax Exemption and Relief Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-342 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 11, 2007, and January 8, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 24, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-263 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-119 became effective on March 20, 2008.
